Updates to this notice Delhi NCR When you use Delhi NCR, you trust us with your personal data. This notice describes the personal data we collect, how it s used and shared, and your choices regarding this data. Scope This notice applies to users of Delhi NCR s services anywhere in the world, including users of Delhi NCR s Uber, websites, features, or other services. This notice applies to all Delhi NCR users globally, unless they use a service covered by a separate privacy notice, such as Delhi NCR Freight or Careem. This notice specifically applies to Riders individuals who request or receive transportation and related services via their Delhi NCR account. Delivery persons who provide delivery services via Delhi NCR Eats, Delhi NCR or Postmates. Uber individuals who receive ride and delivery services ordered by other Delhi NCR account owners, including those who receive services arranged by Delhi NCR Health, Delhi NCR Central, Delhi NCR Direct or Delhi NCR for Business customers collectively, Delhi NCR , or by friends, family members or other individual account owners. For example, we may collect the contact information of owners or employees of restaurants or other merchants on the Delhi NCR Eats, Delhi NCR or Postmates platforms; the contact information of individuals that manage and use accounts owned by Delhi NCR; or data of individuals who start but do not complete their applications to be drivers or delivery persons.
